    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static final void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method takes all the parameters and assumes they are input files for the ray tracer. It tries to render each one and write it out to a PNG file named .png. A '-p' option may be passed in to change the path that is prepended to each file that is included.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • printUsage

        public static void printUsage()

      • run

        public void run(java.util.ArrayList<RayTracer.ScenePath> args)
        The run method takes all the parameters and assumes they are input files for the ray tracer. It tries to render each one and write it out to a PNG file named .png.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • renderImage

        public void renderImage(Scene scene)
        The renderImage method renders the entire scene.
        Parameters:
        scene - The scene to be rendered

      • shadeRay

        public static void shadeRay(Colord outColor,
            Scene scene,
            Ray ray)
        This method returns the color along a single ray in outColor.
        Parameters:
        outColor - output space
        scene - the scene
        ray - the ray to shade
